description: Demonstration of a customization that shows all data.
text: This page shows some data that the rest of the site hides. Parameters This page has the following parameters: [paige] credit = "Paige Theme" edit = "https://github.com/willfaught/paige/edit/master/exampleSite/content/%s" history = "https://github.com/willfaught/paige/commits/master/exampleSite/content/%s" license = "MIT License" [paige.list_page] disable_authors = false disable_date = false disable_keywords = false disable_reading_time = false disable_series = false disable_summary = false [paige.page] disable_authors = false disable_date = false disable_keywords = false disable_next = false disable_prev = false disable_reading_time = false disable_series = false disable_toc = false [paige.site] disable_breadcrumbs = false disable_credit = false disable_license = false
title: Show Data

description: Demonstration of a customization that styles all data.
text: This page styles some data differently than the rest of the site. Parameters This page has the following parameters: [paige] credit = "Paige Theme" edit = "https://github.com/willfaught/paige/edit/master/exampleSite/content/%s" history = "https://github.com/willfaught/paige/commits/master/exampleSite/content/%s" license = "MIT License" style = """ #paige-authors, #paige-breadcrumbs, #paige-content, #paige-copyright, #paige-credit, #paige-date, #paige-description, #paige-file, #paige-keywords, #paige-license, #paige-menu, #paige-page-title, #paige-page-description, #paige-reading-time, #paige-series, #paige-siblings, #paige-site-title, #paige-site-description, #paige-toc { font-style: italic; } """ [paige.list_page] disable_authors = false disable_date = false disable_keywords = false disable_reading_time = false disable_series = false disable_summary = false [paige.page] disable_authors = false disable_date = false disable_keywords = false disable_next = false disable_prev = false disable_reading_time = false disable_series = false disable_toc = false [paige.site] disable_breadcrumbs = false disable_credit = false disable_license = false
title: Style Data

text: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.579 3.932 Including Plots You can also embed plots. See Figure 1 for example: par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'), col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'), init.angle = -50, border = NA ) Figure 1: A fancy pie chart.
title: Hello R Markdown

text: The paige/youtube shortcode plays a YouTube video. Basic Code: {{< paige/youtube "dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Autoplay parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube autoplay=true video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Controls parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube controls=true video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Description parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube description="My title" video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: End parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube end=20 video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Fullscreen parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube fullscreen=false video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Height parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube height="10rem" video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: List parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube list="PLOstxpSiJGlClyRnCiubdXJcUvwgHcrVH" video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Loop parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube loop=true video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Maxheight parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube maxheight="10rem" video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Maxwidth parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube maxwidth="50%" video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Mute parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube mute=true video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Start parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube start=10 video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Video parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} Result: Width parameter Code: {{< paige/youtube video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" width="50%" >}} Result: Figure Code: {{< paige/figure caption="YouTube" >}} {{< paige/youtube video="dQw4w9WgXcQ" >}} {{< /paige/figure >}} Result: YouTube
title: YouTube

text: The paige/tabs shortcode displays content in tabs. Basic Code: {{< paige/tabs >}} {{< paige/tabs/buttons >}} {{< paige/tabs/button >}}JSON{{< /paige/tabs/button >}} {{< paige/tabs/button >}}TOML{{< /paige/tabs/button >}} {{< paige/tabs/button >}}YAML{{< /paige/tabs/button >}} {{< /paige/tabs/buttons >}} {{< paige/tabs/panes >}} {{< paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/code lang="json" >}} {"foo": 123} {{< /paige/code >}} {{< /paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/code lang="toml" >}} foo = 123 {{< /paige/code >}} {{< /paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/code lang="yaml" >}} foo: 123 {{< /paige/code >}} {{< /paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< /paige/tabs/panes >}} {{< /paige/tabs >}} Result: JSON TOML YAML {"foo": 123} foo = 123 foo: 123 Figure Code: {{< paige/figure caption="Tabs" >}} {{< paige/tabs >}} {{< paige/tabs/buttons >}} {{< paige/tabs/button >}}JSON{{< /paige/tabs/button >}} {{< paige/tabs/button >}}TOML{{< /paige/tabs/button >}} {{< paige/tabs/button >}}YAML{{< /paige/tabs/button >}} {{< /paige/tabs/buttons >}} {{< paige/tabs/panes >}} {{< paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/code lang="json" >}} {"foo": 123} {{< /paige/code >}} {{< /paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/code lang="toml" >}} foo = 123 {{< /paige/code >}} {{< /paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< paige/code lang="yaml" >}} foo: 123 {{< /paige/code >}} {{< /paige/tabs/pane >}} {{< /paige/tabs/panes >}} {{< /paige/tabs >}} {{< /paige/figure >}} Result: JSON TOML YAML {"foo": 123} foo = 123 foo: 123 Tabs
title: Tabs

text: The paige/search layout provides site search. Example config.yaml: outputs: home: ["atom", "html", "paige-search", "rss"] Example content/layouts/search.md: --- layout: "paige/search" title: "Search" --- Result:
title: Search

text:
The paige/quote shortcode displays a quotation. Basic Code: {{< paige/quote >}} Hickory dickory dock.
The mouse ran up the clock.
The clock struck one,
The mouse ran down,
Hickory dickory dock. {{< /paige/quote >}} Result: Hickory dickory dock. The mouse ran up the clock. The clock struck one, The mouse ran down, Hickory dickory dock. Cite Code: {{< paige/quote cite="Hickory Dickory Dock" >}} Hickory dickory dock.
The mouse ran up the clock.
The clock struck one,
The mouse ran down,
Hickory dickory dock. {{< /paige/quote >}} Result: Hickory dickory dock. The mouse ran up the clock. The clock struck one, The mouse ran down, Hickory dickory dock. Hickory Dickory Dock Figure Code: {{< paige/figure caption="Hickory Dickory Dock" >}} {{< paige/quote >}} Hickory dickory dock.
The mouse ran up the clock.
The clock struck one,
The mouse ran down,
Hickory dickory dock. {{< /paige/quote >}} {{< /paige/figure >}} Result: Hickory dickory dock. The mouse ran up the clock. The clock struck one, The mouse ran down, Hickory dickory dock. Hickory Dickory Dock
title: Quote

text:
The paige/icon shortcode displays a web font icon. Class parameter Code:

Icon: {{< paige/icon class="bi bi-github" >}}

Result: Icon: Title parameter Code:

Icon: {{< paige/icon class="bi bi-github" title="GitHub" >}}

Result: Icon: GitHub Url parameter Code:

Icon: {{< paige/icon class="bi bi-github" url="https://github.com/willfaught/paige" >}}

Result: Icon:
title: Icon

text: The paige/gallery shortcode displays a list of content. Align parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery align="start" >}} {{< paige/image height="20rem" src="01-2.jpg" >}} {{< paige/image height="10rem" src="02-2.jpg" >}} {{< /paige/gallery >}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery align="center" >}} {{< paige/image height="20rem" src="01-2.jpg" >}} {{< paige/image height="10rem" src="02-2.jpg" >}} {{< /paige/gallery >}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery align="end" >}} {{< paige/image height="20rem" src="01-2.jpg" >}} {{< paige/image height="10rem" src="02-2.jpg" >}} {{< /paige/gallery >}} Result: Breakpoints parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery breakpoints=true images="large/*.jpg" />}} Result: Class parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery class="rounded-5" images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Densities parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery densities="1x 2x 3x" images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Fetchpriority parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery fetchpriority="high" images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery fetchpriority="low" images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Height parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery height="10rem" images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery height="20rem" images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Images parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="1-2.jpg" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" />}} Result: Justify parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" justify="start" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" justify="center" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" justify="end" />}} Result: Linked parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" linked="unprocessed" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" linked="default" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" linked="r180" />}} Result: Loading parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" loading="eager" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" loading="lazy" />}} Result: Maxheight parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" maxheight="10rem" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" maxheight="20rem" />}} Result: Maxwidth parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" maxwidth="10rem" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" maxwidth="20rem" />}} Result: Process parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" process="default" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" process="300x300 center crop lanczos picture r180 webp" />}} Result: Style parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" style="filter: grayscale(100%)" />}} Result: Type Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*.jpg" type="grid" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*.jpg" maxheight="10rem" type="rows" />}} Result: Width parameter Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" width="10rem" />}} Result: Code: {{< paige/gallery images="*-2.jpg" width="20rem" />}} Result: Figure Code: {{< paige/figure caption="Gallery" >}} {{< paige/gallery >}} {{< paige/figure caption="Image 1" >}} {{< paige/image src="03.jpg" >}} {{< /paige/figure >}} {{< paige/figure caption="Image 4" >}} {{< paige/image src="04.jpg" >}} {{< /paige/figure >}} {{< /paige/gallery >}} {{< /paige/figure >}} Result: text: The paige/code shortcode displays code. float x2, y; const float threehalfs = 1.5F; x2 = number * 0.5F; y = number; i = * ( long * ) &y; i = 0x5f3759df - ( i >> 1 ); y = * ( float * ) &i; y = y * ( threehalfs - ( x2 * y * y ) ); return y; } {{< /paige/code >}} Result: float Q_rsqrt( float number ) { long i;
